choices: You lift your bedcover and slide inside hoping to fall asleep.
You go downstairs and slump on the sofa in front of the TV with a bag of crisps.
You decide to go and have a bath to relax before you try to sleep.
1.content:
Your name is Jake and you are 16 years old. The summer holidays have been and gone and you have just arrived home from your first day at college. You walk in through the front door and glance at the hallway mirror as you pass by. Your emerald green eyes dart from your short, spiky, red hair down to your freckled cheeks where you notice the remains of an ink bomb on your face. You lick your thumb and rub it off.

Today has not been a good day for you. Your first lesson of the day was biology which you usually enjoy but today, by the end of the lesson, you had been labeled as the class swot. You are not used to this as you don't really fit into the stereotype. You don't need glasses, you have a good fashion sense and you're quite good looking.

Throughout the rest of the day you ended up with wave upon wave of ink bombs being thrown in your general direction.

Before leaving for home and sanctuary your final lesson of the day was sport. You soon found out why the girls weren't interested in you, despite your good looks. Up until today you had always thought of yourself to be quite a good catch but you were quickly proved to be wrong.

During the after sport shower you began to compare yourself to the other guys in there with you. You found to your disappointment that you were quite small. All the other guys were taller than you, more toned than you and they all had a bigger "package" than you. Only the fat guys, of which there were few, were more insignificant than you. These thoughts stayed with you until you reached home.

"What a horrible way to start" you think to yourself as you walk into the kitchen. You open the fridge door and pour yourself a glass of orange before you walk slowly up to your room. All you want to do now is sleep and forget about the horrid day you have had to endure. It's only 5:30 in the evening but you slip into your boxers that you wear to sleep in anyway.
1.title: It's not your day.

choices: You feel the cold breeze on your feet as they stick out from under your covers.
You feel the cold breeze as your mum pulls the covers off your bed.
11.content:
"Sod it!" you think to yourself. "I'm not putting up with anymore of today. I don't want anything worse to happen." With that you slip into your bed and try to block out the day. You lie there uncomfortably with the thoughts of the day's events circling in your head.

After several minutes pass you decide to alter the way you remember the day to cheer yourself up a bit. You begin to imagine that you are stood in the sport showers again but this time everybody else is envious of you. In your own version of events you are the tallest, most toned guy there and you certainly imagine your dick to be the biggest. You drift off into the land of slumber with these pleasant thoughts and don't wake up again until the next morning when a cold breeze brings you to your senses.
11.title: Slumber.

choices: Stay home from college and see how pumped you can really get.
Decide to go to college as you are to impress your classmates.
111.content:
You lift your head from your pillow and look down at your feet. Normally your whole body fits comfortably into your bed but now your feet are sticking out at the bottom. You spin around to stand up and your feet reach the floor sooner than you expect. You manage to get your balance and walk over to your full length mirror. You feel a little disorientated and your reflexion reveals why.

During your sleep you have grown an extra foot in hight now making you 6'6". Your body is well toned, more than that of the guys in the sport showers, and your boxers feel tighter than usual. You pull the elastic away from your waist. "Oh god yes! This just gets better!" You stare down at your new manhood which now measures at 7 inches long when soft.

"I see you are pleased with your new look." you hear a voice say. It startles you as you don't recognise it.

You have no brothers or sisters and your parents are seperated so you only live with your mum. It can't be your mum because it sounds too masculine.

You look around searching for the owner of the voice when it speaks again. "If you wish, you could become bigger." You stare at the corner of your room and see a pair of eyes staring back at you. Slowly a small wooden looking creature appears and waves at you.

"You did this to me? But how?! you ask in surprise.

"I didn't do it, you did. I mearly gave you the ability to alter your appearence as you wish. All you have to do is imagine the new you and within a few moments it will become reality."

"But why me?" you ask, still staring at the creature's eyes.

"I saw what a terrible day you had and, knowing how good hearted you are, I decide to help."

"Thankyou." you manage to reply. You stare back at the mirror and flex your new muscles.

"I must tell you that you will not be able to shrink below your original size. If you ever feel you have become too large though, you can return to normal by imagining it."

You turn to the mirror once more and thoughts begin to go through your mind.
111.title: Changes are afoot.

choices: The broken mirror takes away your power, and you're stuck at this size.
The broken mirror gives other people power over how big you grow.
1111.content:
First, you focus on making yourself taller. Just to test it out. Since you can return to your normal size, you don't worry about it for now.

You think about being 8 feet tall, and slowly you begin to inch upward. You enjoy the slow growth, so you focus on keeping it slow and steady.

You feel yourself flowing with energy as your body slowly reaches higher and higher. At about 6'11" someone slams on your door which, you luckily, had locked.

"GET UP, ITS ALMOST NOON!" Your mom yells. This startles you, and your concentration is messed up by this event. The shock makes the growth extremely quick, and more than you assumed. At the time your mom slammed on the door, you shot up and your head hit the 11 foot ceiling, and you stopped growing.

"Oww" You say, rubbing your read.

"What was that Jake?" Your mom yells.

"Uh...I feel out of bed, I'll be down in a min!" You yell.

"Alright, I'm going to work, hurry and get out of bed." And with that, your mom leaves.

You shake your head and realize just how tall you actually are, and enjoy it. Now to get ripped.

You focus on yourself being huge, bigger than any body builder ever.

You feel the growth starting in your calves and forearms. They both swell to amazing sizes, and you look at your forearms, making you look like Popeye. Then your biceps slowly begin to swell, pushing your arms outward away from your chest. Veins start to appear that run down your arms.

Your shoulder muscles are next, and they expand and swell, along with your back muscles. Then it moves around to your pecs, and slowly they start to enlarge and swell to inhuman sizes.

As your thigh muscles begin to swell slowly, you feel your thighs rubbing against each other with their mass. You have to alter your stance to stop yourself from falling over. Your abs begin to swell next, each one individually. First, the top 2 swell, then the 2 under those, and so on.

As your thigh muscles reach their desired size, the muscles above your penis and your ass grow muscular. All of the energy that moved through your body now seems to be slowly moving toward your penis.

Then, you feel the energy slowly entering your penis and it begins to swell. The energy makes you erect, reaching about 15 inches, and it grows and grows.

You can actually hear your penis stretching and growing as it thickens and more veins begin to surround it.

Eventually the growth slows down and you feel the energy building up as this happens. Your penis stops growing at 2.5 feet long, erect, and about 8 inches across the top.

The energy builds and builds. You keep picturing your penis becoming bigger and the energy builds even more. Suddenly, your penis grows 2 feet longer in less than a second and hits the mirror in front of you, breaking it.

You smile. Now that is power. But you begin to think, if powers like this exist... then maybe superstition does too... Did you just run yourself into lots of bad luck?
1111.title: Luck

choices: Bigger!
Random-ness
11111.content:
The creature, seeing this entire event, begins to laugh.

"What's wrong? What's so funny?" You ask.

"You just shattered your own power! You've lost control of you power." The creature says.

"What, why? I can't go out on the street this big!" You being to panic. "Isn't there anything you can do?!"

"I only have so much I can do. I can't just use magic like this whenever I want." The creature says. "All I have enough power left to do is use my own will to make you grow bigger, or give you the ability to change your size randomly."

"I don't understand..." You say.

"I can make you grow once more. I'm not even sure how big you'd grow, but you will just grow, and grow kinda slow. On the other hand, I can give you the ability to choose when to give yourself a random size. You won't shrink below your normal height, but you might grow bigger than you are now."

Well, on one hand, you can grow more, and become a god of a man, or you can randomize your size and get back to a relatively normal life.
11111.title: Oh noes!

choices: You grow to 50 feet.
You grow, passing 50 feet.
111111.content:
The creature stares at you intently, waiting for your answer. "Look, You have 3 choices." The creature begins, "You can stay an 11 feet tall muscular giant, which won't garentee your safety. Who knows what government officials might want to run some tests on you. You could become a random size at anytime, which also leaves you very vulnerable, or..."

You cut him off "Look, I don't want to get taken away or anything like that. Why can't i just go back to normal?"

"You broke the mirror while using the power I gave you. The mirror was reflecting the power, now the power is shatterd. I'm just asking which shard do you want."

"I'll stay as I am. I can't risk being 90 feet tall, then normal size within minuites." You say.

"Wait, you didn't even hear a discription of the last solution. I'll make you grow."

"Grow?"

"Just grow." it responds.

"How fast, how big?" You ask. The creature shrugs, and then there is a long pause. "Well?" You ask.

"I don't know, let me ask my supervisor." The creature then pulls out a cell phone, a red motorola razor. You look at him with a generic "wtf?" expression. "Uh...this phone helps fight AIDS in Africa...you know I think AIDS was made as a way to destroy and keep down the African race."

"Um...you don't even look like you're from this planet, what are you talking about?" you ask.

"Back in 1942...oh, one sec. Hey Tim, yeah it's me. I'm on earth granting some wishes. Yeah, the kid wanted to control his size. What? No, no. This time it's not my fault. He broke a mirror. Yeah, he turned his penis into a baseball bat and slammed the mirror. Yeah, how big? For how long? And you said HOW fast? hmm...I don't think anyone would go for that. Fine. Fine...bye."

The creature hangs up his phone, looks at you, and sighs.

The suspense killing you, you get frustrated and ask, "Well?! What did he say?"

"You'll grow, at about an inch a second, and the growth will slowly increase in speed as you get taller, so you'll basically grow. For how long? Well, either until you reach 50 feet, or for the rest of eternity."

"I'll choose 50 feet then."

"No no, you don't choose. It's 50 feet, or infinity, or anything in between."

There is a long pause, as you think about it. "Fine...I'll take it." A once in a life time choice, to become a god. A sexy, giant god. You can't refuse. hopefully this thing can grow you some friends up there too.

"You're a crazy kid...fine..." The creature snaps his fingers.
111111.title: Choice of a god.

choices: You decided to go to the main area of the city
You headed out to the school
1111111.content:
You figured that one way or another, you were going to get big. People were going to see you. You didn't want to leave your mother homeless, however as you stepped out of the house and into the streets. People gawked and looked in shock at your already large stature.

Your quick thinking made you breath a sigh of relief as your growth started. You underestimated the speed of the growing an inch a second. Your entire body was swelling faster than you could imagine. You were at eye level with the roof of the house and soon began to surpass it.

A smile came across your face as everything became smaller. You remained still, not wanting to cause any damage. People either ran away from you or stared at you, but you were the center of attention now.

You made increments of your height progress, starting from the roof to your eyes. Every other minute or so, that point seem to get smaller. At first, you knew you were at least 10 feet. Now, as the house barely came up to your thighs, you lost track of your height.

At last, when the house was size of a miniature doll house, you felt your growth come to a halt. You stood well beyond the neighborhood, with the city only a short distance from you.

The overwhelming feeling of power surged through your head. Your head filled up with possibilities as to what you could do for the day. Perhaps go the city and show off?

Or maybe go to the school to show how big you were now?
1111111.title: You grow to 50 feet.

choices: Sirens were sounding off; the police were coming
Something happened to you or the crowd
11111112.content:
You decided to show off your new body to the school. It was the perfect opportunity to show all the people in the school that you were in control now.

A few minute walk was all you needed to arrive at your school. The men and women were already peeking at the windows at the sight of you. You smiled a little bit to yourself as people and cars moved out of your way. The people were terrified of you, which was understandable; but you hoped in time, they could learn to live with a giant.

As you dazed into your head about the future, you accidentally punted the gate surrounding the school. You barely felt it as you looked down. A good portion of the wall barrier was taken down. Kids inside the school began to flood outside onto the campus as you became flustered. You didn't mean to damage anything. The thoughts immediately went away, however, as you noticed the student body.

All of them looked up to you. You were now the center of attention. Shockingly, you could hear them gossip. Perhaps even more surprisingly was that a few recognized you. The kid was that was ink-bombed; the new guy; the scrawny little guy; these were all the names you heard. You could hear 'Jake' in the crowd, but you weren't sure who it was coming from.

You got on your knees in front of the school's gates. Some people were already running back inside the building for safety, while others stayed. Mainly, as you come to realize, there was more female students than the male students left. You flexed your muscles, teasing the crowd as you sarcastically named off some of the nicknames you heard in the crowd. In your head, you thought that no one could pick on you ever again. In fact, you could help people that were bullied. Or...you could get some redemption and call out the people who gave you a hard time yesterday.

As you pondered in your thoughts-
11111112.title: You headed out to the school

choices: Jake grows for days and weeks, never stopping.
Jake asks for an end to his growing.  He gets an answer.
1111112.content:
You have just made a deal that could allow your body to grow infinitely taller. You might top off at 50 feet, or continue growing forever, or end up somewhere in between. Whatever the outcome, you're ready to go, and haven't started growing yet. You look in the direction of the creature to voice your complaint, but he's gone. A wave of energy passes through your limbs and torso. You know what will follow; some serious size change!

Since your 11 foot tall form is already touching the ceiling, you sit on the bed to allow for this new expansion. You soon realize that a growth rate of one inch per second can quickly add up. Your outstretched legs are advancing across the room toward the open door. You reposition yourself on the floor to buy more time. Within a few moments, though, you are grazing the ceiling again.

The thought of growing right out of the house is an undeniable turn-on, but you decide against it. Each second you waste pouring over options adds to your problem. You squeeze your 22 feet tall body through the door and make your way down the hallway to the stairs. By the time you reach the ground floor, you are 10 feet taller, and still growing. You are now strong enough to walk through walls, but want to minimize the damage to your house. You decide to push out a couple of picture windows in the sun room.

You finally reach the outside and can stand upright for the first time in about 15 minutes. You rise to your new full height and stretch your body. It feels good to be free of those growing restrictions! You look around and enjoy the new view from your 60 foot perspective. The neighbors have started to come out of their homes and most are gaping at you from a safe distance away. You look down at the puny people and smirk. Time is height and height is time. You gain an inch for every second you live and breathe.

At the rate your'e growing, you know it won't take very long before the authorities try to intervene in your fun. You scan the landscape in all directions for any possible sign of the law. Sure enough, you see blue lights off in the far distance. You are just about to break the 100 foot barrier, and feel another wave of energy course through your body. The little creature delivers again, with a tripling of your growth rate! You are now growing 15 feet taller every minute, and loving it!

Your young mind cant really fathom the meaning of infinity, and doesn't yet understand you contracted to continue growing forever! For the moment, you don't care about infinity. You are growing steadily taller and taller, and want to enjoy your commanding size. With the police hot on your trail, you start in the direction of the business district. You are already over 300 feet tall now and should be close to 1000 by the time you stomp out your first national bank building. The day was full of growing opportunities, just waiting to be explored.
1111112.title: Be careful what you wish for...

choices: You grow to 7ft in PE class at school!
You grow in class!
111112.content:
You think about what the creature has just told you. A wide grin appears on your face. You really don’t care all that much about how or when you would grow, as long as your body would just experience growth spurts every day.

“Well then, surprise me!” you respond, as the creature looks up at you with eager anticipation.

“Very well, then” it replies. “Your body will revert back to its normal size after you fall asleep at night. However, from the moment you get up in the morning, you may or may not experience growth spurts, which will strike completely at random. I will make this happen, starting right now!”

“Ooooh…” you say with a smile on your face. “I can’t wait! This is gonna be so cool!”

“Remember, Jake… You won’t know when you’re going to grow! Not only that, but the intensity of the growth spurt is completely at random as well!”

You stare at him with a confused look on your face.

“Uhh… What do you mean?”

“It means, that some days you’ll grow a little, while other days, you’ll grow a lot! It’s completely random…”

You just sigh as you bow your head while deep in thought.

“Ooooh what the heck… I just wanna grow! I don’t care when or how much…. As long as I’m growing!” you cheer.

“Very well!” the creature responds, as it snaps its fingers, just before vanishing into thin air.

“Awwww… he left!” you sigh to yourself, when you realize that the creature has gone.

You quietly turn around and walk out the room. Later on, you slip into the house via the garage door. Your mum is sound asleep, so isn't awake when you come home.

You quietly change clothes in your room, and just put on a large pair of underwear, which were bought for you as a joke one christmas. You then try to climb onto your bed but the wooden frame starts to creak the moment you make contact. Deciding to be cautious rather than risk breaking your bed, and waking up your mum you remove your sleeping bag from the closet and lay it out on the floor, before crawling into it.

The moment you doze off, your body starts to shrink. Since you are already asleep, you never notice how your body dwindles back to its original 5 foot 6 height. Within moments you are back to your old self again, like nothing out of the ordinary had happened to you.

You wake up the next morning feeling the same as always. You're sleepy and groggy, and would much rather just stay in bed all day, than have to get up, shower, get dressed, and catch the bus to school. But, its Friday, and you know that the weekend is just around the corner anyway, so it doesn't matter that much.

As soon as you get out of the shower, you stand in the bathroom admiring your body in the large mirror which is hanging from the wall. You are about to get dressed, after drying off from the shower when you are overcome with an odd, tingling feeling, which goes over your entire body like a wave.

Suddenly, you gasped out loud, as you begin to remember the events of the previous day.

“Oh no… I’m growing! I’m already having my first growth spurt of the day!”

You get as close to the counter as possible and notice how you torso is higher from the floor! You slowly begin growing bigger and taller!

Within a few seconds, you have reached the height of 5’9”.

“Whew… I only grew by three inches…” you sigh, when you feel the growth spurt come to a sudden halt.

But… when will you grow again? And, how big will you get?
111112.title: Jake’s Random Growth Spurts

choices: is a good friend and helps your giant self out.
is a Jerk and takes advange of you.
1111121.content:
You walk into college and you see all the students looking just a wee bit shorter than usual. You walk to your locker and you find a note which falls out of your locker when opened. The note is a schedule. It seems there have been some changes made to your time table. "Well it looks like I got gym first period, good thing I should have had gym later today anyway." You smile and feel all tingly inside. You fail to notice yourself grow two inches more, however.

You walk into the mens locker room and change into you gym clothes. You slip on you pants then your shirt. You notice that they look a bit smaller and feel a bit tighter. You the slip on your sneakers and they too feel tighter. You think nothing of it and head into the gym. You sit down on the bleachers next to your good friend Pete. "Hey, Pete, how's it going?" Pete turns to you and notices your tight clothes and shoes.

"Oh hi, you know your clothes look rather small right?" You look down and then look at pete.

"Yeah I know, they must have shrunk." you tell him.

"Not to mention you look a bit taller."

"I did notice that." Suddenly you here foot steps, then the door swings open and Coach Gibs storms in.

"Today you are going to be playing basketball." announced Coach Gibs. "I wont be here throughout the lesson though as I am needed elsewhere to attend to school matters. I trust you are all old enough to sort yourselves out." He then turns and leaves the room and you go to play basketball. You enjoy being taller because you can make an easy basket. After a while you and Pete sit back on the bleachers to rest. The next thing you notice is a tingle in you body. Slowly you start to inch taller and taller. You look down at your shoes and watch your feet burst through! Pete turns toward you and notices you growing. You see him look at you and decide to run to the locker room. Pete follows you.

In the locker room you continue to grow, higher and higher. You reach your locker and judge yourself to be standing 6'6'' and still growing! Pete walks in and notices your shirt ripping and your muscles bulging. You suddenly stop growing and are now stood in the looker room about 7ft. tall. Pete walks towards you and you suddenly notice you have no way to get out. Pete...
1111121.title: You grow to 7ft in PE class at school!

choices: To Pete's house
To Your House
11111211.content:
There was a minute of silence as you both stared at each other. You were waiting for what Pete would do as he stood there, a mix of horror and confusion on his face.

"Look, Pete," you say, "I know this is kind of weird and confusing, but you have to help me out here. I don't know what I'll do if I grow anymore". Pete quickly nodded and walked over to you. You kind of found it funny, how small he was now, compared to you.

"What do you need me to do?" he asked, coming up to your side. You tell him to get a couple of towels and he does. You quickly tie them around your waist, in case your penis decides to break out of your pants. To your luck, there was a back door in the locker room. You didn't want to skip class, but you had no choice. You couldn't appear outside and say you grew half a foot in a couple of seconds. People will think you're a monster.

Where do you and Pete go?
11111211.title: Help At Hand

choices: 20ft. tall
50ft.
111112112.content:
You and Pete walk outside the backdoor and look around. There is no luck for escape. You are surrounded by 8ft. high barbed wire fences. "How do we get out?" asks Pete as he looks up at you. You look around and relise something: If you grow taller than the fence, you could walk over it. With that in mind, you feel a slight tingle going through your body. You start to grow again. You slowly inch higher and higher. Pete looks as you become larger and larger. You see your shirt rip and fall to the ground. You feel your pants fall down to your feet. The towel around you was certainly getting too small for you.

Soon you stop growing and find you're standing 12ft. tall! You grab Pete with you enormous hand, step over the fence and decide to walk home . As you reach the front door you let Pete walk in first, then you kneel down and sqeeze yourself through the door. Once you're inside you stand up to full height but hit your head on the ceiling. "Ow."

Pete walks into the foyer. "What happened?" he asks you.

"I hit my head on the chandallier."

Pete wanders off looking around your house. "So this is your house." he says walking into another room.

"Yea......it is."

"So, you want to play some games?" asks Pete. You nod your head slowly and began to walk up stairs. Your weight makes the stairs squeak alot. You reach your room and sqeeze through the door. You look around at your tiny room. Everything seems so much smaller. Pete hands you a game controller. You look at your hands and notice they are too big to be of any use. You decide to sit on your bed instead and watch Pete play. Your weight pushes the bed down and you hear a snap! It seems it couldn't quite take the force. You suddenly feel a tingle in you body once again. Pete turns around and sees you begin to shake on your bed. "Dude are you alright? Are you having a fit?" You slowly start to inch higher and higher. How much do you grow?

1111121121.content:
Your form starts to fill the room. You try to get in a position where you won't damage anything, or Pete. In a few seconds, you are at 20 feet tall! You're bending over so you won't go through the ceiling. Your huge feet are almost the length of the room.

"A-a-are you okay?" Pete asks, a little nervous. You nod your head, though you aren't sure if you really are. You could break out of your own house now if you're not careful. But you can't tell when you'll grow next.

That's when you notice
1111121121.title: 20ft. tall

choices: Jake shrinks back to 5 ft 6"
Jake grows back to 20 ft tall again
11111211211.content:
Pete just stared in amazement as you started to dwindle back from being 20 feet tall!

“Whoaoaoa…” Pete sighed, as he watched you shrink. “This is sooooo cool….”

You feel your body compacting as your arms and legs dwindle down rapidly. Your torso shrinks as well, and your body magically remains in proportion. After a few moments, your shrinkage stops. You lookd down at your friend and realize that you’re STILL a lot taller than him!

“Uhhh… I’m not so big anymore…. I’m almost back to normal… I think…” you say.

“Are you kidding me?” Pete says, as he walks up to you.

Pete stands right in front of you and cranes his neck. He barely reaches your waist.

“Grab a measuring tape!” he says. “You’re still over ten feet tall!”

You walk over to your closet and find the measuring tape in the closet. You hold it at the top of your head and let Pete pull out the end of the tape until it reaches the floor.

“12.3 feet! Dang!” Pete exclaims. “You’re more than twice as tall as me!”

“Until the next growth spurt…” you sigh. “But I think I’m slowly shrinking back to normal…”

“Yeah, but it’s so cool! Look how big you are!” Pete grins. “You’re practically twice my height!”

“I know!” you say, looking down at your best friend, who barely reaches your waist.

You reach down and place your big hands under his armpits. Then, you lift him up, until his face comes to the same level as yours.

“Hey! You’re not that heavy!” you say to the smaller boy.

“Whoa! You’re strong!!!” he says.

“Being big has its advantages, I guess…” I said with a smile.

Pete looks down and sees his feet dangling six feet above the floor.

“Uhhh, Jake… I’m afraid of heights, big guy…. Please… Put me down….”

You gently set the little guy back on his feet. No sooner did you put him down, than you were overcome by that tingling feeling again….

“Oh man… Here it comes!” you say to him.
11111211211.title: You're shrinking back to 12 feet tall.

choices: You stay in class, hoping your growth spurt will end.
You dash out of class, and to the nearest restroom.
1111122.content:
You get to class, and begin to ponder your situation. At any time, at any moment, you could grow into a giant and crush and kill people. You don't want to do something like that. Killing wasn't one of the things you enjoy doing.

Sitting in your usual spot in the back of the class, you find it hard to pay attention to your teacher with the constant threat of suddenly growing. You wore a black button up T-shirt today, which still fits you at your new stature. You wore the baggiest jeans you had, which now fit you normally.

For about 20 minutes, you think about your situation, finding no real solution. If you grew to a big enough size, the authorities would get you when you shrank back down, only to suddenly grow again the next day, and be on the run again. You begin to think that eventually, someone would try to kill you, and prevent any destruction.

You try to think of someone who would know about magical curses like this. You remember your crazy uncle Tim. Everyone considers him crazy, and he was put in a home to be taken care of. Well...he is crazy, but he claims he was driven mad because he fiddled with magical...stuff.

You ponder a bit more, trying to think of another person you can go to besides crazy uncle Tim. You then feel a tingle throughout your body.

"Fuck." You whisper, knowing what's about to happen. You decide to ride it out, hoping you dont grow that much.
